text: History of English law is the history of the legal system and laws of England. Coverage of the history of English law is provided by: * Fundamental Laws of England * History of English land law * History of English contract law * History of English criminal law * History of trial by jury in England * History of the courts of England and Wales ==See also== * Commentaries on the Laws of England (book) 1765, by Sir William Blackstone * Institutes of the Lawes of England (book) 1628, by Sir Edward Coke * English parliamentary history * Anglo-Saxon law * Common law CATEGORY: Legal history of England
title: History of English law
